HowItWorksPage.title: How NoRug.fun Works
HowItWorksPage.subtitle: The trenches, with a helmet on.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP1: Propose a token creation and set (with a 10% max):
HowItWorksPage.founderCardL1: The percentage of the supply airdropped to you.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardL2: The lockup period for your share of the supply.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP2: Users can then support your proposal by investing SOL in it, similar to a presale.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP3: If it reaches the top 10 proposals: Congrats! Your token is created, and you receive your percentage of the supply.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP4: If it's not successful enough: The proposal is rejected.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP1: Find a token creation proposal that appeals to you and support it by investing SOL.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP2: If it reaches the top 10 proposals: Congrats! The token you supported is created, and you receive a share of the supply proportional to the SOL you invested.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP3: If it's not successful enough: Congrats! You get your SOL back!
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP4: That's what we call a WIN/WIN situation.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P1: NoRug.fun handles minting, token distribution (to the creator and investors), and creates the liquidity pool with the raised SOL through Meteora.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P2: Investors in non-selected proposals can reclaim their funds.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P3: Everyone can then trade these tokens as usual.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At NoRug.fun, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect only essential information required for the platform to function:
items: Transaction data on the Solana blockchain
Proposal information you choose to share

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: Your information is used exclusively for:
items: Processing your transactions on the platform
Communication about your proposals or contributions

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: Most data is stored on the Solana blockchain and is therefore public. We do not store any personal information on centralized servers.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your information with third parties. All transaction data is publicly available on the Solana blockchain.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any privacy-related questions, please contact us at:

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: Welcome to NoRug.fun. By using our platform, you agree to these terms of use. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using NoRug.fun, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

risks.title: Risks and Responsibilities
items: You are responsible for your wallet security
Past performance does not guarantee future results
You should not invest more than you can afford to lose

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
items: Attempt to manipulate votes or token prices
Use the platform for any illegal activities

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: NoRug.fun is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not responsible for any losses or damages arising from your use of the platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, please contact us at:
